markdown:
<title level="1" right="Creature Family">[Elemental, Earth](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=409)</title>

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 142 <sup>1.1</sup>

Earth elementals make excellent bodyguards for adventuresome spelunkers and are ideal protectors of important subterranean locations such as vaults and treasuries.

<title level="2">Members</title>
[Elemental Avalanche](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2980) (Creature 11), [Living Landslide](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2978) (Creature 5), [Sod Hound](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2977) (Creature 3), [Stone Mauler](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2979) (Creature 9)

<title level="2" right="Creature Family Group">Elemental</title>

**Related Families**
[Elemental, Air](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=41), [Elemental, Air](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=408), [Elemental, Earth](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=42), [Elemental, Fire](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=43), [Elemental, Fire](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=410), [Elemental, Mephit](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=44), [Elemental, Metal](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=343), [Elemental, Scamp](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=411), [Elemental, Water](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=45), [Elemental, Water](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=412), [Elemental, Wisp](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=232), [Elemental, Wood](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=345)
name: Elemental, Earth
